Item.method_code:
Dim id As String= Me.getID() Dim new_filename As String = Me.getProperty("filename") Dim innovator as Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim query As item = innovator.newItem("File", "copyAsNew") query.setID(id) query.setAttribute("do_lock", "0") query.setAttribute("useInputProperties", "1") query.setProperty("filename", new_filename) Dim result as Item = query.apply()
If result.isError() Then Throw New Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorServerException(result.dom) End If
Dim new_id as String = result.getID() query = innovator.newItem("File", "replaceFile") query.setAttribute("id", id) query.setAttribute("newId", new_id) query = query.apply()
If query.isError() Then Throw New Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorServerException(query.dom) End If
Return result
Item.name: RenameFile
